name: Kenai Aviation Inc.
about: Kenai Aviation Inc., established in 1961, serves the Kenai Peninsula with a commitment to safety, service, and flexibility. Founded by Bob Bielefeld to support the energy industry, the company has grown under the ownership of Joel Caldwell since 2018. With a diverse fleet including Cessna 206, Tecnam Traveller P2012, and Beechcraft Super King Air B200, Kenai Aviation offers charter services, flight tours, and FAA-certified flight training (Part 141). The team, led by experienced professionals like Joel Caldwell and Matthew Barnes, ensures efficient and affordable aviation solutions. Kenai Aviation is dedicated to providing top-notch aviation services, from private charters to comprehensive flight training, making it a trusted name in Alaskan aviation.
